candidates.title: As a KCC manager, I want to define clear user roles and permissions in Salesforce
candidates.description: Implement a comprehensive role-based access control system for KCC employees with distinct permission sets for different user types (medewerker, junior, senior, coach, editor, supervisor)
acceptance_criteria: Define roles: medewerker, junior, senior, coach, redacteur, eindredacteur
Create permission set groups for Knowledge Reader, Author, Editor, and Supervisor
Map roles to specific permissions in Salesforce
Enable automatic role assignment via AD groups
notes: Support four-eyes principle for article approval
Consider future multilingual and cross-departmental knowledge sharing

candidates.title: As a system administrator, I want to automate user role assignment through AD groups
candidates.description: Develop an automated system to assign Salesforce permissions based on Active Directory group memberships
acceptance_criteria: Integrate Salesforce role assignment with existing AD groups
notes: Reduce manual work for permission management

candidates.title: As a knowledge management team, I want to create a flexible knowledge article workflow
candidates.description: Design a content management workflow with distinct roles for creating, editing, and publishing knowledge articles
acceptance_criteria: Create roles for article authors, editors, and publishers
Implement feedback mechanism for knowledge articles
notes: Allow feedback and knowledge request submissions
Maintain clear separation between draft and published states
